SELECT o.ID, o.ORG_CODE, o.ORG_NAME, o.PARENT_ID, case when (select COUNT(1) from org_priv_relation opr where 1=1
and opr.POWER_EXPRESSION_id=#{powerExpressionId}

and opr.POWER_EXPRESSION_id=#{powerExpressionId}
and opr.POWER_EXPRESSION_id is null
